job.jobname: EG: Test Aanmaken 640 reparatieorders met contactpersonen

step.datasource:
SELECT
a.HID as HeaderID , 'V' as ord_soort , '1' as betaald , '0' as ordbv_afdr , a.HID AS refer , isnull(cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_02)) as varchar(max)), '') + '/' + isnull(cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_03))as varchar(max)), '') AS refer1 , convert(varchar(10),a.EndDate, 105) as refer3 , a.FreeTextField_04 as docnumber , 'EUR' as Valcode , LTRIM(c.cmp_code) as debnr , LTRIM(c.cmp_code) as verzdebnr --, CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_13, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_07, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN (c.cmp_name) ELSE (a.freetextfield_13) END) ELSE (a.freetextfield_13) END collate database_default AS del_debtor_name , '31917' as ord_ContactPerson --, cast(ci.id as varchar) AS del_ContactPerson --, cast(cit.id as varchar) as hoofdcontactpersoon --, '--' as del_cnt_job_desc --, ad.AddressLine1 AS del_AddressLine1 --, ad.PostCode collate database_default AS del_PostCode --, ad.City collate database_default AS del_City --, ad.Country as del_landcode , LTRIM(c.cmp_code) as fakdebnr , '20' as Magcode , 'ZZ_OP' as kstplcode , a.FreeTextField_10 as selcode , '0' as colli , '0' as Netto_gew , '0' as Bruto_gew --, cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.RequestComments)) as varchar(max)) as Note , 'Artikel 1: ' + cast((CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_06, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN ltrim(rtrim(a.itemcode)) ELSE ltrim(rtrim(a.freetextfield_06)) END) as varchar) + '/ sn: ' + ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_05)) + '/ Locatie: ' + cast (ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_01)) as varchar) as freefield1
FROM dbo.land AS la INNER JOIN dbo.Addresses AS ad INNER JOIN dbo.Absences AS a INNER JOIN [420].dbo.cicmpy AS vic INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c ON vic.debnr = c.debnr ON a.CustomerID = c.cmp_wwn LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.cicntp AS ci ON a.CustomerContactID = ci.cnt_id ON ad.Account = c.cmp_wwn ON la.landcode = ad.Country left outer join [420].dbo.cicntp as cit (nolock) on vic.cnt_id = cit.cnt_id
WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Type = 640) AND (a.FreeBoolField_01 = 0) AND (a.FreeBoolField_05 = 0) AND (ad.Type = 'DEL') AND (ad.Main = 1) and (a.HID='1304624')

SELECT
a.HID as HeaderID , 'TXT' as artcode , '1' as esr_aantal , 'Artikel 1: ' + cast((CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_06, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN ltrim(rtrim(a.itemcode)) ELSE ltrim(rtrim(a.freetextfield_06)) END) as varchar) + '/ sn: ' + ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_05)) + '/ Locatie: ' + cast (ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_01)) as varchar) as oms45 , 'Artikel 1: ' + cast((CASE ISNULL(a.freetextfield_06, 'leeg') WHEN 'leeg' THEN ltrim(rtrim(a.itemcode)) ELSE ltrim(rtrim(a.freetextfield_06)) END) as varchar) + '/ sn: ' + ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_05)) + '/ Locatie: ' + cast (ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_01)) as varchar) as TextDescription
FROM dbo.land AS la INNER JOIN dbo.Addresses AS ad INNER JOIN dbo.Absences AS a INNER JOIN [420].dbo.cicmpy AS vic INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c ON vic.debnr = c.debnr ON a.CustomerID = c.cmp_wwn LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.cicntp AS ci ON a.CustomerContactID = ci.cnt_id ON ad.Account = c.cmp_wwn ON la.landcode = ad.Country left outer join [420].dbo.cicntp as cit (nolock) on vic.cnt_id = cit.cnt_id
WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Type = 640) AND (a.FreeBoolField_01 = 0) AND (a.FreeBoolField_05 = 0) AND (ad.Type = 'DEL') AND (ad.Main = 1) and (a.HID='1304624')
